function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Encouraging international specialization, reducing barriers to trade, and promoting interconnectedness in global value chains.","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Policies to promote economic growth and international cooperation, investments in diverse industries and exports.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Promotion of trade agreements, diversification of export/import markets, and investment in domestic production capabilities.","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of supply chains, investment in domestic production capacity, stockpiling of critical goods","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in flexible supply chain infrastructure, technology-enabled supply chain tracking and management, collaboration with multiple suppliers","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fiscal stimulus, investment in job creation, support for affected industries, public health measures to control contagion","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of manufacturing and industry across multiple regions","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of production networks, strengthening of domestic industries, international collaboration on risk management","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of sourcing, enhancement of domestic manufacturing capabilities, development of alternative trading partnerships","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of supply sources and development of local manufacturing capabilities.","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Support for small and medium-sized trading firms, promotion of diversified trading relationships.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of local sourcing and development of backward and forward linkages in value chains.","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase diversity of suppliers and buyers, establish alternative supply sources, and develop contingency plans for supply chain disruptions.","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encourage diversification of suppliers and buyers, develop flexible sourcing strategies, and promote collaboration between suppliers and buyers.","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of production and trade networks, implementation of risk management strategies","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of antitrust laws, promotion of fair competition, implementation of health and safety regulations","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement comprehensive health and safety guidelines for essential activities, and provide training on infectious disease control measures.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Harmonize norms and standards for health and safety across regions, and promote the adoption of digital technologies for improved information systems.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement border health protocols, mutual recognition agreements, and digital technologies for trade facilitation and risk management.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Policy implementation to make supply chains more resilient","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of policies to make supply chains more resilient","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing policies to foster diversification and resilience in gvcs","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversification of sales and value-added sources, reduction of reliance on foreign demand","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of network connections, promoting decentralized collaborations","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Supplier diversification, risk management strategies","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving stability and resilience to shocks in gvcs, rethinking supply chain organization","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ramping up production, diversifying suppliers","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Balancing localized production with global supply chains, building redundancy in supply chains","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversification of supply sources, stockpiling of essential supplies, onshoring critical production processes","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk diversification, scenario planning, development of domestic capabilities","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving risk preparedness and international cooperation","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving risk preparedness, international cooperation, and trade resilience","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"International cooperation, risk preparedness, and improvement of supply chain resilience","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement reforestation programs and sustainable land use practices to reduce deforestation and control the spread of malaria vectors.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement vector control measures, such as insecticide-treated bed nets and indoor residual spraying, to reduce the proliferation of anopheles mosquitoes.","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Treated screens and electrostatic coating on breeding sites to prevent malaria.","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement measures to control mosquito breeding in construction sites, and promote awareness among construction workers","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent updates and validation of information","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid and accurate communication of information, fact-checking, public education","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of multiple data collection methods and validation measures to ensure data accuracy and completeness","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Peer review of spatial analysis methods, validation of spatial data with ground truth measurements","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Target specific demographic groups and use multiple dissemination channels","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use multiple data collection methods, provide assistance to those with limited internet access, and consider the potential biases in data analysis","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investment in infrastructure improvement, regular sanitation and cleaning schedules, and implementation of waste management systems.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and sanitization of public spaces, implementation of social distancing measures in open areas","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Supplement online survey with offline methods to capture the perspectives of those without online access","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict health and safety measures, vaccination mandates, and event capacity limits","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, expansion of medical facilities, and recruitment of additional healthcare personnel","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement immediate relief measures, develop long-term economic plans, and support entrepreneurship and sustainable business models","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial support for businesses, transitioning to alternative business models, and implementing delivery services","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"}]}
